name: Custom Holiday Fix
description: Enable custom holidays in existing saves, and get rid of that pesky exception notification caused by uninstalling them.

pages.title: For Users
pages.html:
What does this mod do?

  • Makes it easy for other modders to add custom holidays
  • Allows custom holidays to appear in existing saves
  • Fixes an error that occurs after uninstalling custom holidays

    • Important: For this to work, this mod must be kept in your game even after uninstalling custom holidays. It works by detecting when the custom holiday is no longer installed. You can remove this mod after uninstalling the holiday, launching your game, and saving.

Should I install this mod?

If you intend on using any custom holiday mods, even ones that do not list this mod as a requirment, then YES.

This mod works across-the-board, not just on ones that use this mod's method of adding holidays to the calendar - this means that those other custom holidays will appear in existing saves, and be removed properly when uninstalled.

pages.title: For Modders
pages.html:
What can this mod do for me?

This mod makes it easy for you to add custom holidays to the calendar in a safer way, using a snippet - no scripting required. It also ensures that your holiday will appear in existing saves, and that it does not cause exceptions when uninstalled.

How can I use this mod?

Download the modders' documentation to get started - it will show you how you can write and use your holiday injector snippet.

Important notice

Do not include my script in your own download, and do not re-upload it anywhere. Doing so will inevitably lead to users having the same code in their game multiple times, and it WILL cause issues. Remember, this is not just an injector, but also a fix.

pages.title: Changelog
pages.html:
1.0 (June 15, 2023)

  • Add snippet for injecting custom holidays.
  • Retroactively add custom holidays to existing saves.
  • Remove uninstalled custom holidays from saves they're included in.
